author: cmpilato
msg: Don't print notification of an update having finished until all the
working copy locks have been removed.  This completes issue #1556 --
mysterious post-update/checkout delay on huge trees.
This also has the cool side-effect of making svn:externals handling in
update-ish operations now print as nested operations.  I actually
kinda dig this behavior because it means that in a working copy with a
bunch of externals that scroll off the screen, the last thing I see is
the revision of my top-level update.
* subversion/include/svn_wc.h
(svn_wc_get_update_editor, svn_wc_get_switch_editor): Make
'target_revision' a pointer, so we can store the actual revision
to which we updated.  Also, move it to the top of the parameter
list, since it is now dual-purpose.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/update_editor.c
(complete_directory, set_target_revision, open_root, do_entry_deletion,
change_file_prop): Track the fact that the edit baton's
'target_revision' member is now a pointer.
(add_directory, open_directory, add_or_open_file,
absent_file_or_dir, close_file): Track the fact that the edit baton's
'target_revision' member is now a pointer.  Also, use the same
baton convenience variables used elsewhere ('eb', 'pb', et al).
(apply_textdelta): Use the same baton convenience variables used
elsewhere ('eb', 'pb', et al).
(close_edit): No longer call the "update complete" notification.
(make_editor): Make 'target_revision' a pointer, so we can store the
actual revision to which we updated.  Also, move it to the top of
the parameter list, since it is now dual-purpose.
(svn_wc_get_update_editor, svn_wc_get_switch_editor): Make
'target_revision' a pointer, so we can store the actual revision
to which we updated.  Also, move it to the top of the parameter
list, since it is now dual-purpose.  Update call to make_editor().
* subversion/libsvn_client/update.c
(svn_client__update_internal): Rework this function a bit with
aesthetic goals in mind, and pass a pointer to a revision to
svn_wc_get_update_editor().  Also, call the notification function
to indicate completion of our task.
(svn_client_update): Just making it fit in 79 columns.
* subversion/libsvn_client/switch.c
(svn_client_switch): Pass a pointer to the revision to
svn_wc_get_switch_editor().  Also, call the notification function
to indicate completion of our task.
* subversion/clients/cmdline/notify.c
(struct notify_baton): New 'in_external' field.
(notify): Print slightly different messages for externals.
(svn_cl__get_notifier): Populate new 'in_external' baton field.

author: cmpilato
msg: * subversion/libsvn_client/commit.c
(remove_redundancies, svn_client_commit): Just some whitespace mods --
there were some *really* long whitespace lines in here!

author: josander
msg: The './dist.sh' wants the export tree to be named 'release-0.33.1'

author: jszakmeister
msg: Added a MIME type and content header to identify commit messages as being
UTF8 since the log will be UTF8 encoded.
* tools/hook-scripts/mailer/mailer.py
(MailedOutput.mail_headers):  Updated mail header to identify it as UTF8.

author: philip
msg: Fix a bug where pool memory was used after the pool was cleared.
* subversion/tests/libsvn_repos/repos-test.c (dir_deltas): Get a new
revision root for r4 rather than reusing the one obtained for r3.
